attributes.action: exert his influence upon Newgrounds.com mods to stop deleting the threads of a mr meatyhead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the words of the poor, beaten down character himself:

"Every thread I make is deleted. Every post gets me banned. SICK OF IT! Did I deserve it? Once or twice maybe but this is the internet.
Today's new rule about sig pics disqusted me. No more of this. Tell me you guys aren't going through the same thing. If you are please post here and agree so we can get newgrounds to help against these dumb new rules."

please, do all you can to help this noobynoob mr blair.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
